CustomField.inlineHelpText:
1/ Advice: Any question answered by Escalation Team to client advisor. Advisor keeps the lead to reply​.
2/ Investigation: Any question addressed to Escalation Team that requires a third party's answer (ex: Back office, repair team, stores..)​ Advisor keeps the lead to reply.​
3/ Handover: Any very difficult situation that requires Escalation team to take the lead (by call or email) to de-escalate or assist further the client​.
CustomField.label: Type of Support
